title: The Power of a Gentle Answer
itunes:author: Guests: Amber Lia & Wendy Speake
itunes:summary:
It can be really difficult not to react in anger when your kids repeat frustrating behaviors. John and Danny offer a helpful perspective on whining and complaining.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Triggers: Exchanging Parents' Emotional Reactions for Gentle Biblical Responses" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-05-11?try=1&refcd=1090204

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/the-power-of-a-gentle-answer/#featured-resource-cta
